title: Beautifully constructed 1BD / 1BA luxury condo storage, & bike parking
posting_body: Beautifully constructed 1BD / 1BA luxury condo with a view of the San Francisco skyline from the private outdoor patio.

This exclusive open floor plan unit in the sunny SF Shipyard community features designer finishes with Smart home living and Nest systems, Bosch appliances, Caesarstone kitchen countertops, and a convenient breakfast bar.
Also features an in-unit washer & dryer, parking, storage, & bike parking.
Fabulous roof deck with panoramic views of the City and the East Bay.
The dog park just steps away, several playgrounds and public BBQ set-ups, Muni Express goes straight to downtown
